name: todo_back
description: Node.js package to handle the back of a todo

scripts.todo: concurrently "npm run serv1" "npm run serv2" "npm run serv3"
scripts.serv1_nodemon: npx nodemon -e js index.js -i public/* port=4001
scripts.serv2_nodemon: npx nodemon -e js index.js -i public/* port=4002
scripts.serv3_nodemon: npx nodemon -e js index.js -i public/* port=4003
scripts.todo_nodemon: concurrently "npm run serv1_nodemon" "npm run serv2_nodemon" "npm run serv3_nodemon"
